name: Basic
description: Stable, low-risk COMP for everyday use: utility features and solid reliability.

name: Adaptive
description: Learning COMP that tunes to the user over time; stronger in hacks and utility upgrades.

name: Ritual
description: Esoteric COMP designed to access the Veil; powerful but risks corruption and instability.

name: Military
description: Hardened COMP for tactical operations; prioritizes survivability and controlled automation.
